Articles.Content:
Good Evening.

A bit shameless I guess, however have been running a youtube channel and twitch channel for a while now, and figured perhaps I should introduce myself.

I run a youtube channel over here and stream a couple times a week over at twitch.

I'm in Australia; everything is obviously upside-down, which tends to explain my videos and streaming. It also means I tend to be active in the wee hours of the morning for many, so if you're an insomniac, I'm your guy.

I'm also painfully introverted so this has been a way that I can overcome it and have interaction with others of like minds. Feel free to come check it out; feedback and ideas, suggestions are always welcome.
